resources.string: you are logged in and waiting to be alerted
Don\'t have an account yet? Create one

If you find yourself in front of a flooded road, stop and change direction. Avoid standing water. Strictly limit movement and follow the instructions of the authorities. Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena

If the fire is approaching your home Keep calm. Move all flammable materials from around the building to closed and protected areas. Close all passageways (chimneys, windows, doors, etc.)Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena

Get to a safe place without being exposed to the blizzard. Dress in layers of light and warm clothing instead of a heavy garment. Prefer an outer garment. Wear warm waterproof boots. Strictly limit movement and follow the instructions of the authorities. Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena
If you are indoors, evacuate the building from the stairwell. Take refuge in an open and safe area. Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena

As a precaution stay away from windows, corners, doors and exterior walls. Watch for flying debris. Sit on the floor next to an interior wall or under a heavy piece of furniture, such as a table. Limit movement drastically and follow the instructions of the authorities. Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena

In the event that removal from the area is not possible, stay indoors as much as possible and keep indoor air as clean as possible. Strictly limit movement and follow the instructions of the authorities. Self-protection instructions:https://www.civilprotection.gr/el/entona-kairika-fainomena
